(al kuraan 5 : 34) 5 : 33 hi sandahan saparadhi kriyawan hi niyalunu aparadhakaruwanta thaman wa prathishodhanaya kara gena punaruththapanaya wi nawatha warak yaha miniseku lesa jiwath wime ayithiya da memagin sahathika kota atha. 5 : 34 hi sandahan paridi thama wisin karana lada saparadhi kriya piligena ewa pilibandawa pashchaththapayata path wi nawatha warak ewani thaththwayakata path nowi yaha miniseku lesa jiwathwimata adhishtanashiliwa katayuthu karannata ekanga wannanta 5 : 33 hi sandahan danduwam adala nowanneya.

mul gal galawa dama maha muhude gilluwada, antharjalaye athi “mahinda rajapaksha” nama sandahan siyaluma wartha piramin eewa iwath kirimata katayuthu kalada, mahinda rajapaksha janadhipathi thuma shri lankawa wenuwen kala sewaya janathawage hadawath thulin wasan kirimata aanduwata nohaki wi atha. [5].mawil aaru walin patan gath manushika meheyuma magin lowa bihisunuma thrasthawadaya parajaya kirimata mahinda rajapaksha rajayata gathawuye dawas 1027 pamani.
